name: 3BH: Tentacle Difficulties!
description:
OH BOY!  Vortex and DP, two Intergalactic bounty hunters  take refuge on a tropical planet, but are spotted by one of the world's inhabitants: a Giant Tentacle Monster! Take control of one of the girls as you run for your life in this endless runner game, with randomly generated platforms and obstacles for a highscore!

The controls are UP/W Keys for Jumping, and DOWN/S Keys for fast falling in the air.

Game was made with Game Maker, by me, Torball.

Music and SFX made by Chip James.
